name: image-reader
description: Allow you to control and switch an image source to play as a MovieClip.
author: Arthur Muchir <arthur.muchir@gmail.com>

scripts.watch: npm run clean && parallelshell 'npm run watch:lint' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.watch:js: mkdir -p dist && watchify src/ImageReader.js -vd -t browserify-shim -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t brfs -s ImageReader -o dist/image-reader.js
scripts.build: npm run build:lint && npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:uglify
scripts.build:js: mkdir dist && browserify src/ImageReader.js -d -t browserify-shim -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t brfs -t [ uglifyify -x .js ] -s ImageReader | exorcist dist/image-reader.js.map > dist/image-reader.js
scripts.build:uglify: uglifyjs -cm --in-source-map dist/image-reader.js.map --source-map dist/image-reader.js.map --source-map-url image-reader.js.map -o dist/image-reader.js dist/image-reader.js
